# Zeke Sikelianos (Full Index)

> Expanded list of site URLs for LLM ingestion.

Generated from site data. Canonical base: https://zeke.sikelianos.com.

## Sections
- [Contact Me](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/contact): I occupy the internets, and meatspace too
- [Posts](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/posts): Words about programming, design, art, and other things.
- [Projects](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/projects): Things I've built for work and play. Some are still alive, and others have succumbed to the sands of time.
- [Talks](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/talks): Conferences, interviews, podcasts, screencasts, etc.
- [Zeke Sikelianos](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/cv): Résumé & Curriculum Vitae
- [Zeke Sikelianos](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/): designer, natural language programmer, educator

## Projects
- [404](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/404/index): An homage to dead media
- [Acrophonics](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/acrophonics): Explore the alpha-bravo-charlie alphabets of the world.
- [Alan-a-Dale](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/alan-a-dale/index): Cleaned-up GIF of the strutting minstrel from Disney's Robin Hood
- [Bay Area Cultural Asset Map](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/bacam): Arts fundraising intelligence for the Hewlett Foundation
- [Beaver Brook](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/beaver-brook): A building school in Upstate New York
- [Building on Cloudflare with OpenCode](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/build-on-cloudflare-with-opencode): OpenCode turns Cloudflare into a candy store for developers.
- [Bush in 30 Seconds](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/bush-in-30-seconds/index): Advertisting contest submission to prevent Dubya's 2004 re-election
- [chances.js](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/chances): Download the music you hear on chanceswithwolves.com
- [Color Namer](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/color-namer): A rose by any other name would smell as sweet
- [Earth](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/earth): Collected favorites from Google
- [Inpainter](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/inpainter): An AI-powered open-source magic eraser for editing images
- [Kontext Realtime](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/kontext-realtime): Create and edit images using your voice
- [Life in HTTP](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/http): Events in my life as HTTP status codes
- [Machine Project Los Angeles](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/machine-project): Community artspace in Echo Park, Los Angeles
- [Magnetism](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/magnets): A fundamental force of the universe that fits in your pocket.
- [Melitsa Sikelianos](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/melitsa): Collected works of my late aunt
- [Meta Cars of Mexico City](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/meta-cars-of-mexico-city): Futuristic vehicles seen on the streets of CDMX
- [Moby Thesaurus](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/moby): A giant and serendipitous English thesaurus
- [Name that baby girl](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/name-that-baby-girl/index): A searchable compendium of common girly names
- [Ord](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/ord): Multilingual word translations using Wikipedia data
- [Outcasts](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/outcasts): Words that people on Twitter don't think are words
- [Outpainter](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/outpainter): Paint outside the boundaries of existing images using AI
- [Parallax Foxen](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/parallax/index): A little backgroud-position hack
- [Portfolio](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/portfolio): A scrapbook of my design work from 2001 to present day
- [semver.io](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/semver.io): A webservice for tracking versions of Node.js and npm
- [Solresol](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/solresol): A transcoder for a lost musical language
- [Swagger](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/swagger): A framework for documenting and consuming HTTP webservices
- [The Corn Bed](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/corn-bed): A rejuvenating full-body experience
- [Vibe Coding Popup](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/vibe-coding-popup): Teaching people to vibe code in real life.

- [Ableism](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/ableism)

- [Bio](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/bio): A little about me, Zeke Sikelianos

- [Design like Karpathy is watching](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/karpathy): A talk about building AI products with LLMs in mind
- [Donations](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/donations): A bit about my open-source work and how you can help support it financially.
- [ELC Technologies](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/elc): Agile Ruby on Rails consultancy
- [Foxtown Vintage](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/foxtown)
- [Fractured Atlas](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/fractured-atlas): Helping artists succeed as entrepreneurs

- [Ideum](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/ideum): Interactive Exhibit Designers
- [It's my first day at GitHub](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/github): Time to work on Electron and Atom
- [Josephine](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/josephine): Home-cooked meals from your neighbors
- [lodash.chain](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/chain): Filling the enumerable gaps in JavaScript's standard library.
- [Lycée Polyvalent Alphonse Benoit](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/france): A high school in Provence, France
- [Magnets, again.](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/magnets-again): Another dose of electromagnetic propaganda.
- [my npm packages](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/npm-packages/index): A list of all the packages I've published to npm
- [Neogenesis Media](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/neogenesis): Documentary film production house
- [New Orleans Spots](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/nola): A list of some of my favorite places in NOLA
- [New Orleans Street Names](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/new-orleans-street-names): Every street in the Big Easy
- [npm, Inc](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/npm): The package manager for JavaScript
- [Objecty Arrays in JavaScript](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/keyed-arrays-in-javascript): Can we have our cake and eat it too?
- [Ologies on Wikipedia](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/ologies-of-wikipedia): An exhaustive list on the study of many things
- [OpenSauced Interview](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/opensauced-interview): A chat with bdougie, the founder of OpenSauced
- [orgs](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/orgs/index): The GitHub organizations of which I am a member.
- [Powers of Ten](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/powers-of-ten/index): A small study in randomness. Zero, ten, hundred, thousand...
- [Rome & Gold Creative](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/rome-and-gold-creative): Graphic and Industrial Design Agency
- [RSS Feed](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/rss): Get notified whenever I post new content to this site.
- [Santa Barbara City College](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/sbcc): Top-ranked community college, overlooking the Pacific Ocean
- [Sniphr](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/sniphr): A browser extension for saving images and snippets of text
- [The Avocado Armchair](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/avocado-armchair): Reflections on generative AI, and a farewell to Replicate's Berkeley office
- [The Sweet Sensation of Automation](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/npm-and-github-automation-with-heroku): A guide to automated npm publishing and GitHub pushing using Heroku
- [Timeline](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/timeline): A chronology of events in my life.
- [Tokyo](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/tokyo): Notes from a trip to the world's largest urban agglomeration.
- [Travels](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/travels): Places I've been...
- [Twenty Years with JavaScript](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/twenty-years-with-javascript): npm is amazing; I want my mom to understand why.
- [University of New Mexico](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/unm): Public research school in Albuquerque
- [Vaccination Record](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/vax/index)
- [Websites as Apps](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/electron-nativefier): Turn websites into customized desktop apps with Electron
- [Wordnik](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/wordnik): A home for all the words
